title: What is your favorite Loona's teaser for their upcoming mini-album '12:00'? - Quora

response.answer_text: I’m assuming it’s the photo teasers because well yeah but so Loona gave us a lot of different teasers for their upcoming album, my favorites were the third sets of teasers which are these:             I really liked this teaser mainly because of the concept of the teaser and I really like their hair, makeup, and outfits in the photos. I am really looking forward to this comeback and support Loona with 12:00!
